publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2318# Colin Campbell: The First Scottish Ecumenical Assemblyâ€”That the Parliament congratulates the first Scottish Ecumenical Assembly on the themed statement that it agreed in Edinburgh in September 2001 and endorses their intention to work towards a world based on compassion, fairness and justice.
